start.text: You wake up in the middle of the night to find your house completely silent. Too silent. The usual hum of electronics and distant street noises are gone. As you fumble for your phone, you realize it's dead. Panic sets in as you notice a faint, eerie glow coming from under your bedroom door. You gather your courage and approach the door, your hand shaking as you reach for the knob.

choices.text: Open the door and step into the glowing hallway?
Look out the window to check if the whole neighborhood is affected?
Hide under the bed and hope whatever it is goes away?

1.text: You open the door and step into a hallway bathed in an otherworldly green light. The walls seem to pulse with an unseen energy. At the end of the hall, you see three shimmering doorways, each emitting a different colored light.

choices.text: Enter the red doorway, which sounds like whispered chanting?
Choose the blue doorway, from which a cold mist is seeping?
Opt for the yellow doorway, which smells strangely like freshly baked cookies?

2.text: You cautiously peek out the window and gasp. The entire neighborhood is engulfed in a thick, swirling fog that seems to glow from within. In the distance, you see three distinct shapes moving through the mist.

choices.text: Signal to the tall, slender figure gliding eerily down the street?
Try to make out the hunched, shambling form in your neighbor's yard?
Focus on the small, fast-moving shadows darting between houses?

3.text: You dive under the bed, heart pounding. As you lie there, you hear strange noises coming from different parts of the house. Each sound grows louder, coming closer to your room.

choices.text: Investigate the sound of chains dragging across the floor?
Check out the ominous creaking coming from the attic?
Confront the source of the unearthly moaning from the bathroom?

1A.text: You step through the red doorway and find yourself in a dimly lit chamber. Hooded figures surround you, still chanting. The leader approaches, holding out a sacred tome. As they pull back their hood, you realize...

choices.text: It's your high school drama teacher, leading a very intense improv class?
They're all your neighbors rehearsing for a surprise Halloween flash mob?
It's actually a book club meeting for an overly complex fantasy novel?

1B.text: The blue doorway leads you into a frozen landscape. Icy winds whip around you as a monstrous shape looms in the blizzard. As it gets closer, you discover...

choices.text: It's the world's largest snow cone machine malfunctioning?
You've stumbled onto the set of a low-budget Yeti romance movie?
It's a group of overenthusiastic air conditioning repairmen?

1C.text: The yellow doorway opens into a cheerful kitchen. The delicious smell intensifies, but something feels off. As you approach the oven, you realize...

choices.text: Your sleepwalking self has been baking cookies in your sleep again?
A group of health-conscious ghosts are making sugar-free, gluten-free treats?
It's a secret midnight bake-off between rival grandmothers?

2A.text: You wave frantically at the tall figure. It notices you and glides towards your window with inhuman speed. As it gets closer, you see...

choices.text: It's your neighbor on stilts practicing for a circus audition?
A group of kids in a trench coat trying to sneak into an R-rated movie?
It's a new street-cleaning robot with an overly dramatic design?

2B.text: You focus on the hunched form in your neighbor's yard. As your eyes adjust, you make out more details and realize...

choices.text: It's your neighbor doing late-night yoga in a really unflattering outfit?
A group of raccoons have fashioned a crude human disguise?
It's a malfunctioning lawn gnome come to life?

2C.text: You watch the small shadows dart between houses. They seem to be converging on your location. As they reach your yard, you see...

choices.text: A gang of rebellious Roombas making a break for freedom?
An after-hours chihuahua fight club in full swing?
Your parent's embarrassing home videos achieving sentience?

3A.text: You crawl out from under the bed and follow the sound of dragging chains. Turning the corner, you come face to face with...

choices.text: Your cat tangled in a bundle of old Christmas lights?
A very lost and confused scuba diver?
The world's least stealthy burglar wrapped in bubble wrap?

3B.text: You climb up to the attic, the creaking getting louder. As you push open the door, you're confronted by...

choices.text: A squirrel rave in full swing, complete with tiny glow sticks?
Your old toys having a support group for abandoned playthings?
A ghost utterly failing at using a squeaky exercise bike?

3C.text: You approach the bathroom, the moaning growing louder. You fling open the door to find...

choices.text: A bunch of soap bubbles trying to form a barbershop quartet?
Your reflection practicing pickup lines in the mirror?
A plunger gaining sentience and having an existential crisis?

end.text: As the absurdity of the situation sinks in, you can't help but laugh. The spooky atmosphere dissipates, replaced by a sense of relief and amusement. You head back to bed, wondering if perhaps you should cut back on late-night snacks. As you drift off to sleep, you can't shake the feeling that the night's events might make a great story to tell your friends... if only they'd believe you.
